bill.summary: Amends the National Labor Relations Act to deny the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) any authority to enjoin or otherwise restrain the enforcement of any state law on the grounds that it is preempted by or conflicts with the Act. Authorizes the Board to refer its determinations regarding such state laws to the Attorney General.
